page.title: 11Woodham Ferrers Employment
page.content: The prospects of employment in the area are not very good but is lower than in other parts of the country. The following extracts are taken from childrens' writing. My Mum works at a playschool. I like to go and help my Mum. My Dad works as a shop fitter and my Mum owns a company. They have a company that makes parts for extractor fans. My Dad works on the youth training scheme which helps the unemployed. It is called Distribution Training and helps young people get into the retail trade. My Mum works as an Avon lady selling cosmetics from door to door. My brother wants to be a policeman. My Mum is a housewife. My Dad works at Hoffmans in Chelmsford making ball bearings my Mum is a housewife.My Mum works for Marconi Radar as a typist & my Dad is a house- husband but used to drive lorries.
